commentary: Beautiful full delivery, pitched on middle and dragged away to the covers
Skiddy yorker, defender digs it out, 142 kph
Short and wide, batsman scoops over fine leg, 137 kph
Nice outswinger, just outside off, 129 kph, batsman goes for drive
Pitched on leg and turns into the pads, slow 115 kph
Slower ball, full and wide of off, batsman misses
Excellent outswing delivery, 131 kph, outside off stump
Short riser at 138 kph, climbs up awkwardly
Leg side yorker, squeezed away for a single, 140 kph
Wide outside off, batsman leaves it, 125 kph
Full and on middle, driven with ease, 135 kph
Outswing gets the edge, caught at slip, 133 kph
Short ball, pulled away for four, 136 kph
Perfect yorker at the stumps, 141 kph
